# Read input
N = int(input())
H = list(map(int, input().split()))

# Solve
ans = 1
for i in range(N-1):
    if H[i+1] <= H[i]:
        ans += 1
    else:
        break

print(ans)

N = int(input())
H = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0

for i in range(N):
    h = H[i]
    cnt = 1
    while i+1 < N and h >= H[i+1]:
        h = H[i+1]
        i += 1
        cnt += 1
    ans = max(ans, cnt)

print(ans)

N = int(input())

H = list(map(int, input().split()))

count = 0
max_count = 0

for i in range(1, N):
    if H[i] < H[i - 1]:
        count += 1
    else:
        max_count = max(max_count, count)
        count = 0

print(max_count)
